name: xorbi12d
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4

stmt.origin: 3bitr4g(w0, wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4), wn(wb(w1, w2)), wn(wb(w3, w4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wn(wb(w1, w2)), wn(wb(w3, w4))))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wxo(w3, w4), wn(wb(w3, w4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wn(wb(w1, w2)), wn(wb(w3, w4))))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wxo(w3, w4), wn(wb(w3, w4)))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wn(wb(w1, w2)), wn(wb(w3, w4))))
-| wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wxo(w3, w4), wn(wb(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wb(w1, w2), wb(w3, w4)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4)))
-| wb(wxo(w1, w2), wn(wb(w1, w2)))
-| wb(wxo(w3, w4), wn(wb(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w4))

|- wi(w0, wb(wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4)))
-| wb(wxo(w3, w4), wn(wb(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w4))

|- wi(w0, wb(wxo(w1, w2), wxo(w3, w4)))
-| wi(w0, wb(w1, w3))
-| wi(w0, wb(w2, w4))

comment: Equality property for XOR. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Sep-2016.)
